long_description: The Timex Ironman 30-lap watch offers indispensable, Ironman-ready features for women at any level of athletic activity. This watch features a 100 hr. chronograph with lap and split times, 30-lap memory recall and a 24-hr. countdown timer with stop and repeat capabilities. Daily, weekday and weekend alarms with 5 min. backup help keep you on schedule. Time, month, day and date are displayed with large, easy-to-read digits; multiple time zones make traveling easy. INDIGLO(R) Night-Light with Night-Mode activates lighting with the push of a button. Resin strap and case provide comfort and durability. The Timex Ironman 30-lap watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft).
short_description: The Timex Ironman 30-lap watch offers indispensable, Ironman-ready features for women at any level of athletic activity.
